item.title: Upset Pak says BCCI making excuses on bilateral series
item.description: First in the Asia Cup and now again on March 21 as the boxoffice clash between India and Pakistan draws close anticipation growing around a possible bilateral series between the two countries in the near future is only natural

item.title: Dhoni sues 2 media companies over T20 betting news claims Rs 100cr damages
item.description: Indian cricket team captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni on Tuesday sued two media companies Zee Media Corporation and News Nation Network over false news reports and claimed Rs 100crore damages
item.itunes:subtitle: Indian cricket team captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni on Tuesday sued two media companies Zee Media Corporation and News Nation Network over false news reports and claimed Rs 100crore damages
item.itunes:summary: Indian cricket team captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni on Tuesday sued two media companies Zee Media Corporation and News Nation Network over false news reports and claimed Rs 100crore damages

item.title: Australia attack potent enough without Johnson Bailey
item.description: Australia will miss injured paceman Mitchell Johnson but their bowling attack remains potent enough to help them win a maiden World Twenty20 title in Bangladesh captain George Bailey said on Tuesday
item.itunes:subtitle: Australia will miss injured paceman Mitchell Johnson but their bowling attack remains potent enough to help them win a maiden World Twenty20 title in Bangladesh captain George Bailey said on Tuesday

item.title: Drogba will rejoin Chelsea family one day Mourinho

item.title: Clarke batted with broken shoulder in Test century
item.description: Australia captain Michael Clarke batted with a broken shoulder when he scored an unbeaten 161 during his teams decisive win over South Africa earlier this month in their threeTest series the team said on Monday

item.title: History no help now as Manchester United try to salvage season
item.description: If history was the only deciding factor then Manchester United would be highly fancied to overturn their 20 first leg defeat against Olympiakos and reach the quarterfinals of the Champions League on Wednesday

item.title: World T20 India lose warmup game against Sri Lanka
item.description: Sri Lanka beat India by five runs in a close contest in their first ICC World Twenty20 warmup game at ShereBangla National Stadium in Mirpur on Monday

item.title: After Sangakarra Jayawardene to quit T20 Internationals post WC
item.description: Sri Lankan batting stalwart Mahela Jayawardene will retire from Twenty20 Internationals after the conclusion of the ongoing T20 World Cup in Bangladesh ICC announced the news of Jayawardenes decision on Twitter

item.title: Djokovic beats Federer in Indian Wells final
item.description: Novak Djokovic beat his old rival Roger Federer 36 63 763 on Sunday to win a nailbiting BNP Paribas Open final at Indian Wells and capture his first title of 2014

item.title: SaniaCara go down in Indian Wells final
item.description: Sania Mirza and her Zimbabwean partner Cara Black lost to top seeds Hsieh SuWei of Taiwan and Peng Shuai of China in straight sets in the womens doubles final of the BNP Paribas Open on Sunday
item.itunes:subtitle: Sania Mirza and her Zimbabwean partner Cara Black lost to top seeds Hsieh SuWei of Taiwan and Peng Shuai of China in straight sets in the womens doubles final of the BNP Paribas Open on Sunday

item.title: Liverpool crushes Man United 30 in Premier League
item.description: Steven Gerrard scored two penalties as Liverpool closed to within four points of Premier League leaders Chelsea with a 30 win at beleaguered rivals Manchester United on Sunday

item.title: Sons of sex worker street vendor to train with Man Utd

item.title: Five things to know about India at the World T20
item.description: As the World Twenty20 tournament begins in Bangladesh here are five things you need to know about team India and its journey at T20nbsptournaments so far

item.title: Formula One Rosberg starts new era with dominant win Vettel Hamilton retire early
item.description: Germanys Nico Rosberg led from start to finish to win an eventful seasonopening Australian Grand Prix Sunday as world champion Sebastian Vettel and polesitter Lewis Hamilton were both early casualties

item.title: Former Brazil star Rivaldo hangs up his boots
item.description: Former Brazil and Barcelona star Rivaldo officially retired on Saturday after a 24year career that he said was built upon a miracle that allowed him to overcome financial challenges and disappointments

item.title: Yellow brighter than blue Dhonis success rate in IPL is better
item.description: Its difficult to judge a teams form when the last game it played was five months ago Generally since the start of the IPL India have turned up cold for the World Twenty20 If they show up in Bangladesh the same way they will be doing so at their own risk

item.title: No Indian batsman dominated fast bowling as Sachin did Dravid
item.description: Former skipper Rahul Dravid has said that the batting legend Sachin Tendulkar was the first Indian to dominate the fast bowlers and had set a benchmark for the youngsters to take on the quickies

item.title: Djokovic Isner reach Indian Wells semifinals
item.description: The Serb is used to arriving at the BNP Paribas Open with the Australian Open in his back pocket having won the seasons first Grand Slam three straight years He lost in the quarterfinals in Melbourne in January and then lost in the semifinals at Dubai last month

item.title: Underfire Duncan Fletcher faces BCCI top guns
item.description: Duncan Fletcher seems to have won himself some time to save his job Amid strong criticism of Indias dismal run BCCIs top bosses president N Srinivasan and secretary Sanjay Patel had a meeting with the India coach in Chennai on Friday World T20 India need to think out of the box

item.title: Draw keeps Anand on top
item.description: After ambushing top seed Levon Aronian in the opening round Viswanathan Anand showed his superior preparation once again by holding Veselin Topalov of Bulgaria to an easy draw with black pieces
